title: My Plans
description: Alex talks about his plans for the day.
speaker: Alex
text: Today, I want to talk about my plans.
Tomorrow, I will wake up early.
In the afternoon, I will meet my friend.
In the evening, I will stay at home.
I will watch TV or read a book.
I like to make simple plans.
Plans help me organize my day.

questions.q: When will Alex wake up early?
What will Alex do in the evening?
